contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: If you'd like to get in touch, you can send me an email directly at gregoryakerman@gmail.com

rows.title: Web Developer- International Economic Justice League, Remote
rows.content: Building clean user facing interfaces with scss, bootstrap and modern frameworks.
rows.listOne: Fully responsive websites built utilizing Wordpress, html, css3, JavaScript and jQuery, on IIS Server with clean PHP and database operations using MySQL Workbench.
rows.listTwo: Created clean, cross-browser-compatible, responsive markup utilizing HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

rows.title: Web Developer- Nuvve Holding Corp, Remote
rows.content: Helped with the creation of dashboards used by organizations of large fleets of vehicles, mainly buses, who use electric stations. to fuel up, in a bi-directional manner- Discharging electricity back to the electric grid for profit and charging from the electric grid as needed, to fuel their electric fleets of automobiles. This is called vehicle to grid. v2g, technology.
rows.listOne: Learning how v2g works, ReactIS, NextJS Framework. APIs. Noticing APIs are needed. , Sass, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence, Github, Vercel, And several others by their very nature are confidential.
rows.listTwo: Soft Skills Used- Advanced Communication Skills and Techniques with designers. project managers, VC of Engineering, many back end people that provide data that helped create the visual display of Intelligent Electricity Data for the client side.

rows.title: Lead / Architect Web Developer- Regal Assets, LLC, Remote
rows.content: Transitioning a monolithic architecture into a serverless one with a content management system for a 401k company with an affiliate program.
rows.listOne: Worked with client to understand their business needs and translate them into effective WordPress solutions.
rows.listTwo: *Designed and developed custom themes and plugins based on client specifications.

rows.title: Web Developer - Phyn LLC (Belkin), Torrance, CA
rows.content: Demonstrated expertise in front-end web development by overseeing project aspects of a ReactJS application product. Responsible for the build of the Find an Installer Flow - a small ReactJS app developed with Create React for the skeleton, Redux for state management, and Sagas for API calls. Integrated Salesforce by setting up email and contact form ticket routing. Served as architect for the development of the phyn.com website covering multiple phases including a custom administration section partially based on ReactJS that allows users from around the world to create pages in multiple languages.
rows.listOne: Leveraged the Shopify SDK to sell product via the website while using Shopify tools for effective customer management.
rows.listTwo: Developed a custom Salesforce app based on ServiceCloud that allows customers to contact Phyn, LLC and support agents to respond using user-friendly and intuitive interface. Worked with the AWS Lymda Microservices architecture to make gets and posts as needed.

rows.title: WordPress Engineer, NowCom, Los Angeles, CA
rows.content: Partnered across the business with developers, managers, business owners, designers, and specialists in UX and content creation to develop a variety of web projects. Successfully created clean, cross-browser-compatible markup utilizing HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Designed and built WordPress websites best practices and de-facto standards to produce responsive websites. Integrated themes and templates for optimizing mobile platforms and designed functions, custom post types, and well-documented and reusable code.
rows.listOne: Displayed skill to effectively manage multiple project priorities in a fast-paced environment under deadline restraint.
rows.listTwo: Focused on developing responsive websites integrating Google Analytics, utilizing Webmaster Tools, and following SEO and SEM best practices.

rows.title: Web Developer, GA Consulting, Los Angeles, CA
rows.content: Successfully led the planning, launch, and management of multiple business websites while partnering with industry leaders to develop a website for a Los Angeles hotel proposal.
rows.listOne: Utilized expertise in WordPress, HTML, CSS, and graphics to carry out strategic initiatives.
rows.listTwo: Demonstrated ability to build relationships with industry professionals to collaborate on the creation of a website that allows clients to visualize the real estate proposal.

rows.title: Web Developer – Doner Media, Playa Del Vista, CA
rows.content: Designed a BackBoneJS web application for promoting Nescafe utilizing HTML and CSS3 responsive web design, NPM, jQuery, and JavaScript.
rows.listTwo: Winners got to go to a Ricky Martin concert

rows.title: Expert Web Developer – The Agency RE, Beverly Hills, CA
rows.content: Assisted in establishing a web development process and built a website for a suite of luxury apartments.

rows.title: Web Developer and Designer – Silver Discount Properties, Los Angeles, CA
rows.content: Oversaw the design, development, and launch of a variety of company websites with strong emphasis on user-centered design, usability standards, and human factors testing.
rows.listOne: Marketing Website online, via Search Engine Optimization, Pay Per Click Advertising, and Social Media Marketing.
rows.listTwo: Used Google Analytics and Webmaster Tools to track and analyze search engine ranking positions, consulted on and helped with new content creation.

rows.title: General Assembly
rows.listOne: That time I decided to go to Web Dev Bootcamp.
rows.listTwo: Built four apps each in three week sprints.

about.title: Front-End Web Developer
about.text: Top-performing web developer with extensive front-end experience within highly competitive and diverse business industries. Analytical professional skilled in successfully managing all phases of web development projects in line with business initiatives. Exceptional communicator able to build relationships and promote collaboration across business lines to drive impactful change.
